name: Tintin Reporter - Cigars of the Pharaoh
name_original: Tintin Reporter - Cigars of the Pharaoh
description:
After meeting with the Egyptologist Sophocles Sarcophagus during a Mediterranean cruise, the famous reporter decides to investigate the Pharaoh Kih-Oskh's tomb. What terrible secret does the tomb hide? From Egypt to India and Arabia, Tintin and Snowy will follow a lead on narcotics trafficking all the way to the far east.

This new adventure game will immerse players into the captivating comic book's universe and make them the heroes of an epic action adventure masterpiece.
